tooltip.title: Reset
tooltip.content:
Resets the position of the camera rig to its initial pose or origin.

Use the Reset Lens button to reset the lens settings to their default values.

tooltip.title: Damping
tooltip.content: Toggle motion damping. Damping determines the positional and rotational stabilization that are applied to the camera motion.

tooltip.title: Motion Scale
tooltip.content:
Changing the motion scale multiplies the tracked motion along a given local axis.

This can be very useful if there is limited physical space, or to simulate the motion of a crane or a drone.

tooltip.title: Rotation Lock
tooltip.content:
Use the switches to toggle on and off the rotation lock in a specific axis.

Enabling the auto horizon sets the roll to zero when the roll is locked.

tooltip.title: Focal Length
tooltip.content: Use the slider to change the focal length of the camera. This sets the distance, in millimeters, between the camera sensor and the camera lens. Lower values result in a wider Field of View, and vice versa.

tooltip.title: Focus Distance
tooltip.content:
Use the slider to set the focus distance from the camera sensor in meters.

*Changing the focus distance forces the Focus Mode to Manual.

tooltip.title: Aperture
tooltip.content: Use the slider to set aperture or F-Stop.

tooltip.title: Focus Mode
tooltip.content:
Select the focus mode between DoF Clear, Manual, or Auto.

Clear: disables Depth of Field.

Manual: tapping the screen sets the focus to the 3D point under the tap location. Focus distance does not update as the object moves.

Reticle AF: tapping the screen places a reticle that constantly sets the focus to the 3D point under the reticle.

Tracking AF: tapping the screen selects the scene object under the reticle. Focus distance updates as the distance between the camera and that point changes.

tooltip.title: Timeline
tooltip.content: Plays the assigned Timeline and animations in the editor.

tooltip.title: Playback
tooltip.content: Toggles playback mode. When in playback mode, use the timeline to play the previous take.

tooltip.title: Settings
tooltip.content: Opens the settings window to configure view options, joystick settings, recording options, etc.

tooltip.title: Take Configuration
tooltip.content: Select a take to use as the iteration base and lock camera channels for the next take.
